Title: Shuvaa
Writer: Rabindranath Tagore (story), Momtajuddin Ahmed (story developed), Momtajuddin Ahmed (screenplay), Wakil Ahmed (screenplay), Josna Kazi (associate screenplay), Momtajuddin Ahmed (dialogue)
Actors: Purnima, Shakib Khan, Tushar Khan, Sajon
Plot: Shuvaa was named as Shuvashini (one who has melodious voice) but she grows as deaf and dumb. Her father married off her two elder sister Suhashini and Sukeshini with grant ceremony. Now its...
